# Learning Metrics & Definitions

- **Engagement**: attendance, participation, time‑on‑task
- **Comprehension**: L1/L2 accuracy, misconception rates
- **Progress**: pace vs plan, completion of milestones
- **Retention**: spaced retrieval scores across time
- **Transfer**: performance on L3/L4 tasks
- **Satisfaction**: CSAT/NPS post‑session
- **Equity**: performance variance across learner segments
- **Quality**: QA gate pass rate; accessibility violations
